description.value:
School: divination;
Level: Sorcerer 5, Wizard 5; Domain: Community 5;
Components: V, S, M (pieces of eggshell from two different kinds of creatures)
Casting Time: 1 standard action
Range: close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)
Target: you plus one willing creature per three levels, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart
Duration: 10 Minute/Level (D)
Power Points/Spell Points Cost: 9
Saving Throw: None
Spell Resistance: no

Description

You forge a telepathic bond among yourself and a number of willing creatures, each of which must have an Intelligence score of 3 or higher. Each creature included in the link is linked to all the others. The creatures can communicate telepathically through the bond regardless of language. No special power or influence is established as a result of the bond. Once the bond is formed, it works over any distance (although not from one plane to another).

If desired, you may leave yourself out of the telepathic bond forged. This decision must be made at the time of casting.

Telepathic bond can be made permanent with a permanency spell, though it only bonds two creatures per casting of permanency.

Material Component: Pieces of eggshell from two different kinds of creatures.

materials.value: pieces of eggshell from two different kinds of creatures

Telepathic bond can be made permanent with a permanency spell, though it only bonds two creatures per casting of permanency.

specialActions.action: Create unique "Telepathic Bond" from "D35E.commonbuffs" on target;Set buff "Telepathic Bond" field data.level to max(1,(@cl)) on target;Set buff "Telepathic Bond" field data.timeline.enabled to true on target;Set buff "Telepathic Bond" field data.timeline.formula to 100*(@cl) on target;Set buff "Telepathic Bond" field data.timeline.deleteOnExpiry to true on target;Activate buff "Telepathic Bond" on target
specialActions.name: Telepathic Bond

target.value: you plus one willing creature per three levels, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart
